summary: Provides a GPU‑accelerated implementation of SpecAugment that randomly masks contiguous frequency and time regions of input spectrogram tensors, modifying the data in‑place using a Numba CUDA kernel for efficient parallel execution across batch, frequency, and time dimensions.
business_intent: Enhance the robustness and generalization of automatic speech recognition models by applying fast, large‑scale spectrogram augmentation during training, reducing overfitting and improving performance on varied acoustic conditions.
